item.title: RscDomination - Running on Dedicated server (Now Online)
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

Listen to me very clearly… The only part I play or have played in this server is to help staff it and a few edits here and there. I’d suggest whatever issue you have, you take it up with the owner. By doing so, I don’t mean troll his advert either… www.rscdomination.net - take up any issue you have on the forum.

As for players having things thrown back at them, that’s just a wild accusation with no support behind it. The owner has always been in it for the sole purpose of providing a fun place for rsc lovers to hang out. As do most server owners who throw a server online for other people. (with a few exceptions of cash grabbers). You’ll realise this when/if your server comes out.

Read full topic
item.source: RscDomination - Running on Dedicated server (Now Online)
